title: Riot gave me a summoner icon?
body:
I was randomly given a summoner icon after I logged on with a message saying "Thank you". Does anyone know why? I'm puzzled. This was not a mystery icon. This is what it looks like http://imgur.com/a/ivuHd. So ummmm thanks Riot, I guess.

Off topic: If a Rioter does chance upon reading this, what does Riot think of being constantly called Rito. xD

replies.body:
https://i.imgflip.com/1ojog2.jpg

Yes!  Yes!  Everyone gets a cosmic ruin icon--by getting 33 kills in the [Dark Star game mode](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/learn-more-about-dark-star-2017)!  Congrats!
